bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of an unusual disease with a malodorous liquid flowing from the mouth and nose, mixed with dead items of iron color and the size of polished rice. JFP JF 26: 口鼻中腥臭水流，以碗盛之，有鐵色蝦魚粳米大，走躍不住，以手 捉之，即化為水，此肉壞矣 , “From mouth and nose a stinking liquid flows. If one fills it into a bowl it contains items of an iron color as big as shrimps or polished rice. They move and jump continuously. If touched by one’s hand they transform into water. This is ‘ flesh decay ’”.
